韇字的基本解释

韇
dú
箭筒：“弓鞬韇丸一，矢四发。”
古代占卜用的耆草筒：“筮人执策抽上韇。”

韇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dú］
［《廣韻》徒谷切，入屋，定。］
(1)盛箭筒。参见“韇丸”。
(2)古代筮人盛放蓍草的器具。

韇字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　韇； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1392第31
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?徒谷切，音獨。【說文】弓矢韇也。【玉篇】以藏矢。【廣韻】箭筩。【集韻】今謂之胡鹿。【儀禮·士冠禮】筮人執筴，抽上韇，兼執之，進受命於主人。【註】藏筴之器。今時藏弓矢者，謂之韇丸也。【集韻】亦作皾。

韇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
韇字的起名意思

暂无。

Yun
Basic explanation of words
Yun
du
The quiver: "The bow 韇韇韇一韇一, the arrow has four shots."
A straw tube used in ancient divination: "Song people are in charge of drawing the wind."
Yun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dú］
["Guangyun" Tuguqie, enter the house, set. ]
(1) Sheng quiver. See "Yongwan".
(2) The utensils used by ancient people to plant yarrow.
Yun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　韇; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 1392 31
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Tuguqie, with independent sound. [Said the text] Gong Shi Yun also. [Jade articles] to hide the arrow. [Guang Yun] Arrows. [Jiyun] Today is called Hulu. [Rituals·Shiguan Ceremony] The Qiu people hold the qi, draw the 韇, hold on to both, and enter and be ordered by the master. [Note] A hidden device. Those who hide bows nowadays are called Yun Maru. 【Ji Yun】also used as Hui.
Yun
